(This is a reply to Carnage's last post with DB. It may seem a little late and out of it, but I was one of the hotmail people.)

Tavatron:

Tavatron growled in frustration. Didn't he ever give up?! She was a warrior as well, but knew when to lay down her weapons and rest! Tavatron's ears perked as she listened to the battle. The Alliance was retreating! 

Tavatron unsheathed her drill sword and ran in front of Dinobot. She pointed the tip of her blade at his chest. Tavatron looked him square in the optics, but this time she wasn't soul-searching. A look of stern determination was etched on her face:

"The Alliance had retreated. We have been ordered to return to base... NOW." Tavatron snarled softly. She knew that if he really wanted to battle she couldn't stop him, but she would try. 

Tavatron sighed as she tried to calm herself. She had not meant to sound so harsh, or to act so rashly. She was worried, despite what Dinobot had said earlier she knew he was in pain. Tavatron's look softened:

"Please, if not for your sake then for my own..."
